remarks: Inference from Theorem 19.23 of [Margaris] p. 90.  (Restricted quantifier version.)  (Contributed by NM, 18-Jun-2014.)
statement:
rexlimdvva.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
rexlimdvva $p |- ( ph -> ( E. x e. A E. y e. B ps -> ch ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d ch x y $.
$d ph x y $.
